text: Is anjaam ke mustahiq woh is liye huey ke unke paas unke Rasool khuli khuli daleelein (clear signs) aur nishaniyan lekar aate rahey, magar unhon ne kaha" kya Insan humein hadayat deinge ?" Is tarah unhon ne maanne se inkaar kardiya aur mooh pheir liya. Tab Allah bhi unsey be-parwa ho gaya aur Allah to hai hi be niyaz aur apni zaat mein aap Mahmood (Praiseworthy)
